title: Todo list
descr: This is a simple project for maintaining the daily tasks of the user. The user can add new tasks, delete or edit them, and display them as done tasks. Used technologies for this project: Javascript, React, Firebase.

title: Traveller
descr: This project is a travel agencies webpage. The user can read the different pages, look for a tour, click on the cards for details. Used technologies for this project: Javascript, React.

title: Movies
descr: This project works with different databases, the webpage is a collection of actors, movies, series. The items are sorted by popularity, and the user can search for them. Used technologies for this project: Javascript, React.

title: Blog
descr: This project allows the user to create a user, add new blogposts, edit or delete existing blogposts, like blogpostst. The posts have different categories, the user can filter them. Used technologies for this project: Javascript, React, Firebase.
